title: Key bindings broken after migration
body:
Before the migration I was using key_bindings to remap `shift+enter` to `ctrl+J` I had this in my yml: ``` key_bindings: - { key: Return, mods: Shift, chars: "\x0a" } ``` After migration, I have ended up with: ``` [[keyboard.bindings]] chars = """ """ key = "Return" mods = "Shift" ``` Which obviously would not work. If I change it to: ``` [[keyboard.bindings]] chars = "\x0a" key = "Return" mods = "Shift" ``` I get this error: ![image](https://github.com/alacritty/alacritty/assets/20520590/4d8e3bd4-7351-4731-ab6d-3a880e163f19) How to properly migrate my binding? ### System OS: Linux arch 6.6.8-arch1-1 Version: alacritty 0.13.0 (78fa4d6f) Linux/BSD: X11, dwm ### Logs Font/Terminal size:
`alacritty -vv` output

``` Created log file at "/tmp/Alacritty-32495.log" [0.000005308s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Welcome to Alacritty [0.000058667s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Version 0.13.0 (78fa4d6f) [0.000067257s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Running on X11 [0.000490288s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Configuration files loaded from: "/home/dusan/.config/alacritty/alacritty.toml" [0.014139298s] [INFO ] [alacritty] Using GLX 1.4 [0.014319489s] [DEBUG] [alacritty] Picked GL Config: buffer_type: Some(Rgb { r_size: 8, g_size: 8, b_size: 8 }) alpha_size: 8 num_samples: 0 hardware_accelerated: true supports_transparency: render_mode: "Lcd", lcd_filter: 1 } [0.084260992s] [DEBUG] [crossfont] Loaded Face Face { ft_face: Font Face: Bold Italic, load_flags: TARGET_LIGHT, render_mode: "Lcd", lcd_filter: 1 } [0.104816570s]
